name: amorphie-flow-studio
description: Visual editor for Amorphie Workflow Projects - A VS Code extension for designing and managing workflow definitions
author: Amorphie Flow Studio

scripts.build: npm run -w packages/core build && npm run -w packages/graph-core build && npm run -w packages/webview build && npm run -w packages/extension build
scripts.build:ci: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm -w packages/core run watch & npm -w packages/graph-core run watch & npm -w packages/webview run dev & npm -w packages/extension run watch
